selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use to calculate the measure of angle ∠BOC using the angle sum property and properties of angle bisectors.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use to format the final answer as a single line output.

new_skill_specs.name: calculate_angle_bisector_intersection
new_skill_specs.purpose: Calculate the measure of angle ∠BOC using the given angle ∠A and properties of angle bisectors.
edge_cases: Ensure angle ∠A is valid and within the range of possible triangle angles.
